chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
y: lb
x: lb

Goal:
x ⟂ y -> x ⊕ y ≂ x ↑ y

Premises:
Notation lb := (list bool)
lb_join_eq : forall x y : lb, x ≂ y -> forall x0 y0 : lb, x0 ≂ y0 -> x ↑ x0 ≂ y ↑ y0
lb_ortho_iff : forall x y : lb, x ≂ y -> forall x0 y0 : lb, x0 ≂ y0 -> x ⟂ x0 < -> y ⟂ y0
lb_ortho_join : forall a x y : lb, a ⟂ x ↑ y < -> a ⟂ x /\ a ⟂ y
lb_ortho_meet_nil : forall x y : lb, x ⟂ y < -> x ↓ y ≂ nil
lb_ortho_anti : forall a b x y : lb, a ⪯ b -> x ⪯ y -> b ⟂ y -> a ⟂ x
Inductive lb_ortho : lb -> lb -> Prop := in_lb_ortho_0 : forall l : lb, nil ⟂ l | in_lb_ortho_1 : forall l : lb, l ⟂ nil | in_lb_ortho_2 : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x = ⟘ \/ y = ⟘ -> l ⟂ m -> x :: l ⟂ y :: m Arguments lb_ortho (_ _)%list_scope Arguments in_lb_ortho_0 _%list_scope Arguments in_lb_ortho_1 _%list_scope Arguments in_lb_ortho_2 [x y]%bool_scope [l m]%list_scope
in_lb_ortho_2 : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x = ⟘ \/ y = ⟘ -> l ⟂ m -> x :: l ⟂ y :: m
lb_meet_eq : forall x y : lb, x ≂ y -> forall x0 y0 : lb, x0 ≂ y0 -> x ↓ x0 ≂ y ↓ y0
lb_mask_le_iff : forall x y : lb, x ≂ y -> forall x0 y0 : lb, x0 ≂ y0 -> x ⪯ x0 < -> y ⪯ y0
lb_mask_equiv_cons : forall x y : bool, x = y -> forall x0 y0 : lb, x0 ≂ y0 -> x :: x0 ≂ y :: y0
lb_ortho_iff_Proper = fun (x y : lb) (H : x ≂ y) (x0 y0 : lb) (H0 : x0 ≂ y0) => (fun (x1 y1 : lb) (H1 : x1 ≂ y1) => match H1 with | conj H2 H3 => fun (x2 y2 : lb) (H4 : x2 ≂ y2) => match H4 with | conj H5 H6 => conj (lb_ortho_anti H3 H6) (lb_ortho_anti H2 H5) end end) x y H x0 y0 H0 : Morphisms.Proper (lb_mask_equiv ==> lb_mask_equiv ==> iff) lb_ortho Expanded type for implicit arguments lb_ortho_iff_Proper : forall [x y : lb], x ≂ y -> forall x0 y0 : lb, x0 ≂ y0 -> (x ⟂ x0 -> y ⟂ y0) /\ (y ⟂ y0 -> x ⟂ x0) Arguments lb_ortho_iff_Proper [x y] _ [x0 y0]
lb_nat_eq : forall x y : lb, x ≂ y -> ⟦ x ⟧ = ⟦ y ⟧
lb_join_eq_Proper = fun (x y : lb) (H : x ≂ y) (x0 y0 : lb) (H0 : x0 ≂ y0) => (fun (x1 y1 : lb) (H1 : x1 ≂ y1) => match H1 with | conj H2 H3 => fun (x2 y2 : lb) (H4 : x2 ≂ y2) => match H4 with | conj H5 H6 => conj (lb_join_mono H2 H5) (lb_join_mono H3 H6) end end) x y H x0 y0 H0 : Morphisms.Proper (lb_mask_equiv ==> lb_mask_equiv ==> lb_mask_equiv) lb_join Expanded type for implicit arguments lb_join_eq_Proper : forall [x y : lb], x ≂ y -> forall x0 y0 : lb, x0 ≂ y0 -> x ↑ x0 ⪯ y ↑ y0 /\ y ↑ y0 ⪯ x ↑ x0 Arguments lb_join_eq_Proper [x y] _ [x0 y0]
lb_mask_equiv_rst_Transitive = lb_mask_equiv_trans : Transitive lb_mask_equiv Expanded type for implicit arguments lb_mask_equiv_rst_Transitive : forall [x y z : lb], x ≂ y -> y ≂ z -> x ⪯ z /\ z ⪯ x Arguments lb_mask_equiv_rst_Transitive [x y z]
lb_plus_eq : forall (a : bool) (x y : lb), x ≂ y -> forall x0 y0 : lb, x0 ≂ y0 -> lb_plus a x x0 ≂ lb_plus a y y0
lb_nat_eq_Proper = fun (x y : lb) (H : x ≂ y) => (let H0 : forall l m : lb, l ≂ m -> ⟦ l ⟧ = ⟦ m ⟧ := fun l m : lb => match lb_mask_equiv_equal l m with | conj x0 _ => x0 end in H0) x y H : Morphisms.Proper (lb_mask_equiv ==> eq) lb_nat Expanded type for implicit arguments lb_nat_eq_Proper : forall [x y : lb], x ≂ y -> ⟦ x ⟧ = ⟦ y ⟧ Arguments lb_nat_eq_Proper [x y]
lb_ortho_cons_inv : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x :: l ⟂ y :: m -> (x = ⟘ \/ y = ⟘) /\ l ⟂ m
lb_ortho_ind : forall P : lb -> lb -> Prop, (forall l : lb, P nil l) -> (forall l : lb, P l nil) -> (forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x = ⟘ \/ y = ⟘ -> l ⟂ m -> P l m -> P (x :: l) (y :: m)) -> forall l l0 : lb, l ⟂ l0 -> P l l0
lb_ortho_sind : forall P : lb -> lb -> SProp, (forall l : lb, P nil l) -> (forall l : lb, P l nil) -> (forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x = ⟘ \/ y = ⟘ -> l ⟂ m -> P l m -> P (x :: l) (y :: m)) -> forall l l0 : lb, l ⟂ l0 -> P l l0
lb_mask_equiv_rst_Symmetric = lb_mask_equiv_sym : Symmetric lb_mask_equiv Expanded type for implicit arguments lb_mask_equiv_rst_Symmetric : forall [x y : lb], x ≂ y -> y ⪯ x /\ x ⪯ y Arguments lb_mask_equiv_rst_Symmetric [x y]
lb_ortho_mask_nil : forall a x : lb, a ⟂ x -> x ⪯ a -> x ≂ nil
equal_lb_mask_equiv : forall x y : nat, x = y < -> ⟬ x ⟭ ≂ ⟬ y ⟭
binary_le_le : forall x y : nat, x ≲ y -> x <= y
binary_le_lb_mask : forall x y : nat, x ≲ y -> ⟬ x ⟭ ⪯ ⟬ y ⟭
lb_minus : forall a b : lb, a ⪯ b -> {c : lb | a ⟂ c /\ b ≂ a ↑ c}
lb_complement : forall a b : lb, {c : lb | b ⟂ c /\ a ↑ b ≂ c ↑ b}
lb_plus = fix lb_plus (a : bool) (l m : lb) {struct l} : lb := match l with | nil => lb_succ a m | x :: l0 => match m with | nil => lb_succ a l | y :: m0 => let (r, z) := bin_add a x y in z :: lb_plus r l0 m0 end end : bool -> lb -> lb -> lb Arguments lb_plus _%bool_scope (_ _)%list_scope
lb_ortho_anti_left : forall a b x : lb, a ⪯ b -> b ⟂ x -> a ⟂ x
lb_meet_eq_Proper = fun (x y : lb) (H : x ≂ y) (x0 y0 : lb) (H0 : x0 ≂ y0) => (fun (x1 y1 : lb) (H1 : x1 ≂ y1) => match H1 with | conj H2 H3 => fun (x2 y2 : lb) (H4 : x2 ≂ y2) => match H4 with | conj H5 H6 => conj (lb_meet_mono H2 H5) (lb_meet_mono H3 H6) end end) x y H x0 y0 H0 : Morphisms.Proper (lb_mask_equiv ==> lb_mask_equiv ==> lb_mask_equiv) lb_meet Expanded type for implicit arguments lb_meet_eq_Proper : forall [x y : lb], x ≂ y -> forall x0 y0 : lb, x0 ≂ y0 -> x ↓ x0 ⪯ y ↓ y0 /\ y ↓ y0 ⪯ x ↓ x0 Arguments lb_meet_eq_Proper [x y] _ [x0 y0]
lb_join_cons : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), (x :: l) ↑ (y :: m) = x || y :: l ↑ m
Inductive lb_mask : lb -> lb -> Prop := in_lb_mask_0 : forall l : lb, nil ⪯ l | in_lb_mask_1 : forall l : lb, l ⪯ nil -> ⟘ :: l ⪯ nil | in_lb_mask_2 : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x ⪦ y -> l ⪯ m -> x :: l ⪯ y :: m Arguments lb_mask (_ _)%list_scope Arguments in_lb_mask_0 _%list_scope Arguments in_lb_mask_1 [l]%list_scope Arguments in_lb_mask_2 (_ _)%bool_scope [l m]%list_scope
in_lb_mask_2 : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x ⪦ y -> l ⪯ m -> x :: l ⪯ y :: m
lb_mask_leb : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x ⪦ y -> l ⪯ m -> x :: l ⪯ y :: m
measure_rect : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> nat) (P : X -> Type), (forall x : X, (forall y : X, m y < m x -> P y) -> P x) -> forall x : X, P x
BinInt.Z.le = fun x y : BinNums.Z => BinInt.Z.compare x y <> Gt : BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z -> Prop Arguments BinInt.Z.le (_ _)%Z_scope
BinInt.Z.lt = fun x y : BinNums.Z => BinInt.Z.compare x y = Lt : BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z -> Prop Arguments BinInt.Z.lt (_ _)%Z_scope
lb_mask_inv_cons : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x :: l ⪯ y :: m -> x ⪦ y /\ l ⪯ m
lb_pointwise_sym : forall (f : bool -> bool -> bool) (l m : lb), (forall x y : bool, f x y = f y x) -> lb_pointwise f l m = lb_pointwise f m l
lb_pointwise = fun f : bool -> bool -> bool => fix lb_pointwise (l m : lb) {struct l} : lb := match l with | nil => match m with | nil => nil | _ :: _ => map (f ⟘) m end | x :: l0 => match m with | nil => map (fun x0 : bool => f x0 ⟘) l | y :: m0 => f x y :: lb_pointwise l0 m0 end end : (bool -> bool -> bool) -> lb -> lb -> lb Arguments lb_pointwise _%function_scope (_ _)%list_scope
lb_mask_le_iff_Proper = fun (x y : lb) (H : x ≂ y) (x0 y0 : lb) (H0 : x0 ≂ y0) => (fun (x1 y1 : lb) (H1 : x1 ≂ y1) => match H1 with | conj H2 H3 => fun (x2 y2 : lb) (H4 : x2 ≂ y2) => match H4 with | conj H5 H6 => conj (fun H7 : x1 ⪯ x2 => lb_mask_trans H3 (lb_mask_trans H7 H5)) (fun H7 : y1 ⪯ y2 => lb_mask_trans H2 (lb_mask_trans H7 H6)) end end) x y H x0 y0 H0 : Morphisms.Proper (lb_mask_equiv ==> lb_mask_equiv ==> iff) lb_mask Expanded type for implicit arguments lb_mask_le_iff_Proper : forall [x y : lb], x ≂ y -> forall x0 y0 : lb, x0 ≂ y0 -> (x ⪯ x0 -> y ⪯ y0)...

``` 
intros.
intros ortho_xy.
unfold lb_ortho_equiv.
intros a b ortho_xa ortho_yb.
apply lb_mask_equiv_rst_Transitive with (a := x ⊕ y).
apply lb_meet_eq_Proper; auto.
apply lb_ortho_iff; auto.
apply lb_ortho_iff; auto.
apply lb_ortho_mask_nil with (a := x); auto.
apply lb_ortho_mask_nil with (a := y); auto.
```

original: intros. intros ortho_xy. unfold lb_ortho_equiv. intros a b ortho_xa ortho_yb. apply lb_mask_equiv_rst_Transitive with (a := x ⊕ y). apply lb_meet_eq_Proper; auto. apply lb_ortho_iff; auto. apply lb_ortho_iff; auto. apply lb_ortho_mask_nil with (a := x); auto. apply lb_ortho_mask_nil with (a := y); auto.
